actions.committee: House Committee on Banking, Finance and Urban Affairs
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Banking, Finance and Urban Affairs.

committees.committee: House Banking, Finance, and Urban Affairs

official_title: A bill to amend the U.S. Export-Import Bank Act of 1945 as amended to authorize the Bank to engage in the use of extraordinary measures of export finance to counter and ultimately discourage the use of such measures by other major trading countries.
subjects: Export-Import Bank of the United States

summary.text: Competitive Export Financing Act of 1979 - Amends the Export-Import Bank Act of 1945 to direct the Export-Import Bank to adopt export finance programs comparable in structure to those extraordinary measures of official export credits offered by competing countries, until such financing is limited by international agreements. Requires the Bank to report to Congress as to whether any increase in its commitment authority or ceiling levels is necessary to carry out this Act.

titles.title: A bill to amend the U.S. Export-Import Bank Act of 1945 as amended to authorize the Bank to engage in the use of extraordinary measures of export finance to counter and ultimately discourage the use of such measures by other major trading countries.
